Question: This person stated prophetically that "this war would absorb our troops by divisions.".
Hints: This person forced Israel, the UK, and France to end their invasion of Egypt during the Suez Crisis of 1956.
After his retirement, this person referred to his appointments of Warren and Brennan as his "great mistakes as President.".
This person is remembered for his role in World War II, the creation of the Interstate Highway System and ending the Korean War.
